SEARCH
Package model.File

Class ImageLoader

java.lang.Object
model.File.ImageLoader
public class ImageLoader extends Object

This class provides utility methods for loading and scaling images in the application. It includes functionality for loading images from the classpath and scaling images to desired dimensions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageLoader

      public ImageLoader()

  • Method Details

    • getImageFrom

      public ImageIcon getImageFrom(String path)

      Retrieves an image from the specified relative path within the src folder of the application. Loads the image as an ImageIcon object using the class loader, scales it to the desired dimensions, and returns the final ImageIcon.

      Parameters:
      path - The relative path of the image file within the src folder.
      Returns:
      ImageIcon object representing the loaded and scaled image, or null if the image is not found or loading fails.

    • scaleImage

      public static ImageIcon scaleImage(ImageIcon icon, double scale)
      This method scales the specified ImageIcon to the desired scale factor. Calculates the new width and height based on the original dimensions and the scale factor, and scales the image using Image.SCALE_SMOOTH algorithm.
      Parameters:
      icon - The ImageIcon to be scaled.
      scale - The scale factor to apply to the image (e.g., 0.5 for 50% scale).
      Returns:
      ImageIcon Scaled ImageIcon object.

    • scaleImage

      public static ImageIcon scaleImage(ImageIcon icon, int newWidth, int newHeight)

      This method:

      • Scales the specified ImageIcon to the specified width and height.
      • Scales the image using Image.SCALE_SMOOTH algorithm to ensure smooth resizing.
      Parameters:
      icon - The ImageIcon to be scaled.
      newWidth - The new width of the scaled image.
      newHeight - The new height of the scaled image.
      Returns:
      ImageIcon Scaled ImageIcon object with the specified dimensions.
